Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.branch

Class Branch

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.branch.Branch
  • public class Branch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a list of actions that are subsequently legal. It always contains an EndBranch action.

      Last action of the branch
      private boolean invalidState
      Boolean that gets the "true" value only if the user's decisions no longer match this branch.

    • Field Detail

      • actionCompletedEvent

        public final IEvent<Branch,​Action> actionCompletedEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. It is invoked when a full action is completed.

      • extActionCompletedEvent

        public final IEvent<Branch,​ExtendableAction> extActionCompletedEvent

      • endBranchEvent

        public final IEvent<Branch,​EndBranchAction> endBranchEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. It is invoked when the EndBranch action is completed.

      • invalidState

        private boolean invalidState
        Boolean that gets the "true" value only if the user's decisions no longer match this branch.

      • actions

        private java.util.ArrayList<Action> actions
        List of actions the branch is made of.

      • finalAction

        private Action finalAction
        Last action of the branch

    • Constructor Detail

      • Branch

        private Branch​(Action finalAction,
               java.util.List<Action> actions)
        Constructor. It assigns the input parameters to the global ones. It also sets up the events relative to actions being completed.
        Parameters:
        finalAction - Last action of the branch.
        actions - List of actions the branch is made of.

      • Branch

        public Branch​(java.util.List<Action> actions,
              EndBranchAction endBranchAction)
        Constructor. It assigns the input parameter and subscribes to the completedActionEvent of the EndBranch action, setting up the endBranchEvent when it is invoked.
        Parameters:
        actions - List of actions the branch is made of.
        endBranchAction - EndBranch action relative to this branch.

      • Branch

        public Branch​(java.util.List<Action> actions,
              ExtendableAction extendableAction)
        Constructor. It assigns the input parameters and subscribes to the completedActionEvent of the extendableAction, setting up the extActionCompletedEvent which is invoked when the other is.
        Parameters:
        actions - List of actions the branch is made up of. For the branch to be executed, it means every action is called in the right order
        extendableAction - Final action of the branch, used to create a continuation (the branch would otherwise expire without continuing)

      • Branch

        public Branch​(Action action,
              EndBranchAction endBranchAction)
        More specific constructor.
        Parameters:
        action - Single action that substitutes the list of action in the more generic case
        endBranchAction - Final action of the branch, used to create a continuation (the branch would otherwise expire without continuing)

      • Branch

        public Branch​(Action action1,
              Action action2,
              EndBranchAction endBranchAction)
        More specific constructor that takes 2 actions and puts them into an array and then calls the original constructor.
        Parameters:
        action1 - First action that's going to be put into the array
        action2 - Second action that's going to be put into the array
        endBranchAction - EndBranch action relative to this branch.

      • Branch

        public Branch​(Action action1,
              Action action2,
              Action action3,
              EndBranchAction endBranchAction)
        More specific constructor that takes 3 actions and puts them into an array and then calls the original constructor.
        Parameters:
        action1 - First action that's going to be put into the array
        action2 - Second action that's going to be put into the array
        action3 - Third action that's going to be put into the array
        endBranchAction - EndBranch action relative to this branch.

      • Branch

        public Branch​(ExtendableAction extendableAction)
        More specific constructor that only requires an extendable action as a parameter. It then calls the original constructor using an empty list referring to the actions.
        Parameters:
        extendableAction - extendable action relative to this branch

      • Branch

        public Branch​(Action action,
              ExtendableAction extendableAction)
        More specific constructor that calls the original constructor by creating a list made by one action.
        Parameters:
        action - Action that's going to be put into the singleton list.
        extendableAction - extendable action relative to this branch

      • Branch

        public Branch​(Action action1,
              Action action2,
              ExtendableAction extendableAction)
        More specific constructor that calls the original constructor by creating a list made by 2 actions.
        Parameters:
        action1 - First action that's going to be put in the 2 actions list.
        action2 - Second action that's going to be put in the 2 actions list.
        extendableAction - extendable action relative to this branch

      • Branch

        public Branch​(Action action1,
              Action action2,
              Action action3,
              ExtendableAction extendableAction)
        More specific constructor that calls the original constructor by creating a list made by 3 actions.
        Parameters:
        action1 - First action that's going to be put in the 2 actions list.
        action2 - Second action that's going to be put in the 2 actions list.
        action3 - Third action that's going to be put in the 2 actions list.
        extendableAction - extendable action relative to this branch

    • Method Detail

      • getCompatibleActions

        public java.util.List<Action> getCompatibleActions()
        Calculates which is the list of actions still legally usable by the player. The list is calculated by first checking whether the branch is still compatible with user's previous decisions. Then for every action, this method checks whether it is optional or not and in affirmative cases it adds the action to the return list.
        Returns:
        The list of actions still legally usable by the user.

      • goNext

        public boolean goNext​(Action justDoneAction)
        Based on the previously selected action, this method calculates whether there is a possible legal continuation compatible with this branch or not.
        Parameters:
        justDoneAction - Action previously selected (and completed) by the user
        Returns:
        Boolean that represents whether there ia another action legally possible.

      • initializeNewAction

        private void initializeNewAction​(Action action)

        public boolean isInvalidBranch()
        Getter fo invalidState
        Returns:
        invalidState

        private void setInvalidState()
